title: Café Melba: A Community Hub for Families & Friends
blurb: Lifestyle café with family-friendly vibe and spacious areas.
description: Café Melba is a lifestyle café in Singapore, inspired by the vibrant influences of Melbourne and Asia. We blend casual dining with a family-friendly vibe, offering quality coffee, fresh pizzas, sandwiches, and select Asian dishes in a relaxed setting with spacious outdoor areas. As a hub for families, friends, and community events, we combine Eastern and Western traditions to create inclusive, memorable experiences, striving to be a trendsetter in Singapore’s café scene. title: Cafe Melba: A Family-Friendly Dining Experience
description: Cafe Melba values quality in every aspect, from ingredients to service, ensuring a memorable dining experience. We celebrate diversity and strive to create a welcoming environment where everyone feels valued. We aim to be an active participant in our community, hosting events and activities that bring people together and foster meaningful connections. We cultivate a relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere for families, ensuring that guests of all ages can feel at home and enjoy their time with us. Our goal is to provide a space where families can create lasting memories while enjoying delicious food and drinks in a comfortable setting.

title: Cafe Melba at Goodman Arts Centre
blurb: Quality dining experience for our guests.
description: Cafe Melba values quality in every aspect, from ingredients to service, ensuring a memorable dining experience. We celebrate diversity and strive to create a welcoming environment where everyone feels valued and included, regardless of their background. Our cafe offers a diverse menu with options for families and children, making it a great place for a relaxed meal. Enjoy our delicious food and drinks in a comfortable and inclusive atmosphere. We aim to provide a high-quality experience for all our guests, with a focus on fresh ingredients and excellent service. Our goal is to create a welcoming space for everyone.

title: Cafe Melba Goodman - Family-Friendly Atmosphere
blurb: Relaxed atmosphere for families of all ages.
description: Cafe Melba aims to be an active participant in cultivating a relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere for families, ensuring that guests of all ages can feel at home and enjoy their time. The Goodman location offers a spacious environment suitable for families with young children. It features both indoor and outdoor seating, with a dedicated play area for kids. The menu includes a variety of options catering to both adults and children, making it a convenient and family-friendly dining destination. The relaxed setting allows parents to unwind while children are entertained, creating a pleasant dining experience for the whole family.

title: Cafe Melba at Goodman Arts Centre Playground
blurb: Cafe with a playground at Goodman Arts Centre.
description: Cafe Melba at Goodman Arts Centre offers a relaxed dining experience with a spacious playground, making it ideal for families with children. The playground allows kids to play while parents enjoy their meals. The menu features a variety of dishes, from wood-fired pizzas to pasta and grilled meats, catering to different tastes. The venue also hosts events and offers catering services. It's a great spot for a casual family outing, combining good food with a fun play area for kids. The atmosphere is family-friendly and welcoming, making it a popular choice for parents looking to dine out with their children. The playground is well-maintained and provides a safe environment for kids to play and explore. The cafe also offers high chairs and a kids' menu, ensuring a comfortable dining experience for families.
venue_name: Cafe Melba at Goodman Arts Centre
